channel.title: Portfolios on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Portfolio

item.title: Tweet Sentiment
item.description: A Spark Streaming application for live tweets sentiment analysis, created using Scala to continuously read data from Twitter about a topic.

item.title: House Price Prediction
item.description: A Machine Learning model built using Kaggle data which can be used to predict the final price of a house based on the features.

item.title: FaceRecognition
item.description: Image recording, preparing image data, and training with pre-built Haar-cascade classifier to recognize face.

item.title: Chatbot
item.description: A chat bot designed to simulate conversation with users base on Artificial Intelligence.

item.title: Sentiment of a Movie Review
item.description: Used pretrained word embeddings from Stanford Core NLP GloVe data to train models with NN, CNN, and RNN. Used RNN model to predict the sentiment of new review.

item.title: Customer Churn
item.description: Classification model to predict whether or not the customer is likely to leave the bank based on various customer characteristics using PyTorch.

item.title: Passengers Count
item.description: Time Series Prediction to predict the count of traveling passengers based on historical data using Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) Neural Network

item.title: Car Evaluation
item.description: Create a deep learning classification model to evaluate a car based on its characteristics with TensorFlow2.0

item.title: Petrol Consumption
item.description: Create a deep learning regression model to predict petrol consumption based on tax, income, highway rides and driver license holding with TensorFlow2.0

item.title: Language Translation
item.description: Deep Learning LSTM language translation model built with Keras using Neural Machine Translation with seq2seq encoder-decoder architecture.

item.title: Text Generation
item.description: Deep Learning model to predict the next word based on a sequence of input words built with Keras using LSTM Neural Network

item.title: Comment Toxicity
item.description: A Multi-label classification model to predict the probability of each type of toxicity for comments using deep learning with Keras.

item.title: Business Reviews
item.description: Multi-Input Classification Model to classify user reviews regarding different businesses, built using deep learning with Keras.

item.title: Customer Targeting
item.description: Binary Classification model to predict whether a customer will be interested on a particular advertisement based on customer Ad-Clicks data.

item.title: Black Friday Shopping
item.description: Regression model to predict the amount of money that a person is likely to spend on Black Friday based on features like gender, occupation, age etc. and exploring the trends.

item.title: Text Summarization
item.description: Automatic text summarization with simple NLP-based technique to summarize textual data from Wikipedia articles.

item.title: Wine Quality
item.description: Classification model to predict the quality of wine based on different attributes.

item.title: Shopping Trends
item.description: Clustering to segment customers into different groups based on their shopping trends using Hierarchical Agglomerative Clustering.

item.title: Spam SMS
item.description: Classification to detect Spam SMS using Naive Bayes’ Classifier.

item.title: Glass Type
item.description: Classification to find the type of glass based on their oxide content using Random Forest Classifier after Dimensionality Reduction with Principal Component Analysis and Linear Discriminant Analysis.

item.title: Currency Note Autheticity
item.description: Classification to predict if a bank currency note is authentic based on its image features using multiple classifiers.

item.title: Weather Prediction
item.description: Regression to predict temperature based on different weather aspects.

item.title: Covid-19 Sentiments
item.description: Using Twitter data to perform sentiment analysis on the tweets on the COVID-19 virus.

item.title: Covid-19
item.description: Viewing data graphically to understand the impact of the Novel Coronavirus country-wise over time.

item.title: Image Recognition
item.description: Image recognition using deep learning.

item.title: Digit Recognition
item.description: Classification to recognize hand written digits.

item.title: Shopping Analysis
item.description: Shopping basket analysis using Association Rule Mining.

item.title: CV
item.description: My Online CV

item.title: Kinship
item.description: ‘Kinship’ is a simple tool that finds out what are the related words (kins) to a particular word that twitter users have twitted.

item.title: Personal Website V3
item.description: Third iteration of my personal website built with Gatsby and hosted with Netlify on GitHub Pages.

item.title: Movie Search
item.description: Movies Search based on self-implemented TF-IDF values and Cosine-Similarity computed using movie plot summaries data taken from CMU Movie Summary Corpus.

item.title: Airport Rank
item.description: Rank top airports based on self-implemented Page Rank values computed using their connections data from Bureau of Transportation Statistics.

item.title: News Topic Modelling
item.description: News Topic modelling with Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) by scraping news articles from CNN News website

item.title: Text2Number
item.description: Implementation of text vectorization. Since most of the statistical algorithms, e.g machine learning and deep learning techniques, work with numeric data, therefore we have to convert text into numbers. Several approaches exist in this regard. The most famous ones are Bag of Words, TF-IDF.

item.description: Created a social network of users liking each other's posts in a graph structure.

item.description: Finding the crimes cluster in a region using Kmeans clustering as silhouette.

item.title: Car Analysis
item.description: Classify cars as automatic or manual. Predict mileage of cars.

item.title: Sentiment on US Airline
item.description: Analyzing sentiment on US Airlines with Logistic Regression, Random Forest classifier, Naive-Bayes classifier using tweets data on US Airline.

item.title: Sentiment of a sentence
item.description: Used dataset of labelled sentences to learn a model and use the same to analyze the sentiment of new sentences.

item.title: Earthquakes
item.description: Fetch data from USGS and plot on a map the areas across the world that had a 4.5+ earthquake in the last 24 hours.

item.title: High Temperature Anomaly
item.description: Fetch data from NASA and plot on a map the areas in California that are prone to having active fires due to a high temperature anomaly.

item.description: Support Vector Machine (SVM) Classifier model with Stochastic Gradient Decent (SGD) using Principal Component Analysis and Spectral Clustering.

item.description: Self-implementation of Ensemble methods - Bagging and Boosting - on Decision Tree ID3 algorithm and comparing it with Scikit Learn implementation using Mushroom Data Set.

item.description: Self-implementation of Decision Tree ID3 algorithm and comparing it with Scikit Learn implementation using MONK's Problem and Tic-Tac-Toe Endgame Data Set.
